Required Skills: Create analytical modeling solutions to drive higher member engagement and improve member journey in digital channels.
Job Type: Python, R, SQL, HQL, NoSQL, statistical analysis, machine learning, data manipulation
Perks Summary: The Data Scientist will gather and interpret structured and unstructured data to enable analytical solutions for the business, while developing and deploying models within the established framework. The role involves consulting with internal teams to ensure alignment with business needs and identifying risks associated with business activities.
Notes/Feedback: USAA offers comprehensive medical, dental, and vision plans, a 401(k) pension, paid time off, and various wellness programs, in addition to career path planning and continuing education opportunities.
